sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react";
import Newitem from "./newitem";

export class news extends Component {
  news = {
    status: "ok",
    totalResults: 60582,
    articles: [
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Maharashtratimes.com",
        },
        author: null,
        title:
          "महेंद्रसिंग धोनीला संघाचे मार्गदर्शक बनवल्यावर झाला मोठा राडा, बीसीसीआयकडे तक्रार दाखल",
        description:
          "भारताचा माजी कर्णधार महेंद्रसिंग धोनीला ट्वेन्टी-२० विश्वचषकासाठी भारतीय संघाचे मार्गदर्शक बनवण्याचा निर्णय बीसीसीआयने घेतला खरा, पण त्यानंतर आता मोठा वाद झाला आहे. याबाबत आता बीसीसीआयकडे तक्रारही दाखल करण्यात आली आहे.",
        url: "https://maharashtratimes.com/sports/cricket/cricket-news/bcci-received-complaint-regarding-conflict-of-interest-of-ms-dhoni-as-mentor-of-team-india-in-t-20-world-cup/articleshow/86073371.cms",
        urlToImage:
          "https://maharashtratimes.com/photo/msid-86073371,imgsize-26488/pic.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T17:05:46Z",
        content:
          ": - . . . , .. . . , ... . , . . . , . () . , .... . - . . . . , , . , . . Marathi News App: ? .Web Title : bcci received complaint regarding conflict of interest of ms dhoni as mentor of team … [+373 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: "espn-cric-info",
          name: "ESPN Cric Info",
        },
        author: "Nagraj Gollapudi",
        title:
          "Manchester Test prospects brighten, entire India squad tests negative",

          "NewsThe fate of the fifth Test was in balance after India's assistant physio Yogesh Parmar was tested Covid-19 positive",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "PRNewswire",
        },
        author: null,
        title:
          "Hughes and OneWeb Announce Agreements for Low Earth Orbit Satellite Service in U.S. and India",
        description:
          "WASHINGTON, Sept. 9, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Hughes Network Systems, LLC (HUGHES), an innovator in satellite and multi-transport technologies and networks for 50 years, and OneWeb, the low Earth orbit satellite communications company, today announced that they h…",
        url: "https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/hughes-and-oneweb-announce-agreements-for-low-earth-orbit-satellite-service-in-us-and-india-301372781.html",
        urlToImage:
          "https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/1611579/OneWeb_Logo.jpg?p=facebook",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T17:01:00Z",
        content:
          "WASHINGTON, Sept. 9, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Hughes Network Systems, LLC (HUGHES), an innovator in satellite and multi-transport technologies and networks for 50 years, and OneWeb, the low Earth orbit s… [+6300 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Livemint",
        },
        author: "mint",
        title: "Sri Lanka’s economic crisis poses challenges for India",
        description:
          "Our Neighbourhood First policy had led to increased economic cooperation with Sri Lanka but its economy is in deep trouble and India’s relations with it have taken a turn for the worse this year",
        url: "https://www.livemint.com/opinion/online-views/sri-lanka-s-economic-crisis-poses-challenges-for-india-11631206452325.html",
        urlToImage:
          "https://images.livemint.com/img/2021/09/09/600x338/Sri_Lanka_(2)_1555822633642_1631206790745.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T17:00:29Z",
        content:
          "Indias Neighbourhood First policy towards Sri Lanka had resonated with Sri Lankas India First foreign and security policy in 2020. India is Sri Lankas third largest export destination, after the US a… [+5482 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Stuff.co.nz",
        },

        title:

        description:

        content:
          "ANALYSIS: If youre a Black Caps fan thinking you might be torturing yourself late at night by watching the worst Twenty20 series in cricket history well, we cant console you. Because you are. Wit… [+3174 chars]",
      },

        },

        title:

        description:

        url: "https://www.stuff.co.nz/sport/cricket/black-caps/126329053/on-thin-ice-the-alarming-decline-of-black-caps-matchwinner-colin-de-grandhomme",

        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T17:00:00Z",
        content:

      },

        author: null,
        title:

        description:
          "CHICAGO, Sept. 9, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- In-depth analysis and data-driven insights on the impact of COVID-19 included in this global sports nutrition market report. The sports nutrition market is expected to grow at a CAGR of over 10.09% during the period 2020…",
        url: "https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sports-nutrition-market-size-to-reach-revenues-of-usd-26-11-billion-by-2026--arizton-301372697.html",

        content:
          "CHICAGO, Sept. 9, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- In-depth analysis and data-driven insights on the impact of COVID-19 included in this global sports nutrition market report. The sports nutrition market is exp… [+8331 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Livemint",
        },
        author: "PTI",
        title:
          "Axis Bank lists $600 mn AT-1 sustainable bonds on IFSC exchanges",
        description:
          "The bonds were listed on the global securities market platform of India International Exchange (India INX) and debt securities market platform of NSE International Exchange (NSE IFSC), the two bourses said in separate statements",
        url: "https://www.livemint.com/industry/banking/axis-bank-lists-600-mn-at-1-sustainable-bonds-on-ifsc-exchanges-11631205966368.html",
        urlToImage:
          "https://images.livemint.com/img/2021/09/09/600x338/Axis_Bank_1630507997669_1631206697664.jfif",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:59:45Z",
        content:
          "New Delhi: Axis Bank has listed its $600 million Additional Tier 1 (AT1) sustainable bonds on IFSC (International Financial Services Centre) exchanges at Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT)… [+2586 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "The Indian Express",
        },
        author: "Anju Agnihotri Chaba",
        title:
          "The Centre’s hike in MSPs is just on paper, won’t benefit farmers: Experts",
        description:
          "The farmers, however, were quick to reject the enhanced MSP, particularly for wheat, which is considered as one of the main crops of the country, as too little.",
        url: "https://indianexpress.com/article/explained/the-centres-hike-in-msps-is-just-on-paper-wont-benefit-farmers-experts-7499678/",
        urlToImage:
          "https://images.indianexpress.com/2021/09/farmer-1200-1.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:56:51Z",
        content:
          "Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday had announced an increase in Minimum Support Price (MSP) for Rabi crops, which he said will ensure maximum remunerative price for farmers and also encourage … [+4313 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Index.hu",
        },
        author: "Németh Tamás, Holló Bettina, Nótin Tamás",
        title:
          "Orbán Viktor a nyugati gondolatok apokaliptikus hangulatáról beszélt",
        description:
          "Orbán Viktor a nyugati gondolatok apokaliptikus hangulatáról beszélt - Páratlanul nehéz és egyben nagyszerű évtizedek várnak a fiatalokra a kormányfő szerint.",
        url: "https://index.hu/belfold/2021/09/09/orban-viktor-mcc-megnyito/",
        urlToImage:
          "https://kep.cdn.index.hu/1/0/3977/39775/397756/39775635_3034833_bab616538a61a0a78185a94a395a1288_wm.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:56:00Z",
        content:
          "Orbán Viktor miniszterelnök az MCC diákjainak azt mondta, páratlanul nehéz és nagyszer évtizedek várnak a nemzedékükre. Méltatta az évnyitó feladóját, a brit történészt, akinek könyvei rendkívüli jel… [+3663 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "PRNewswire",
        },
        author: null,
        title: "Youth SDG Summit Announced",
        description:
          "NEW YORK, Sept. 9, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, international youth organization UNITE 2030 announced the Youth SDG Summit, a 3-day virtual convening of young leaders and sustainability stakeholders and decision-makers from across 6 continents to fight for a b…",
        url: "https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/youth-sdg-summit-announced-301372772.html",
        urlToImage:
          "https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/1612172/SHARED__The_Youth_SDG_Summit__General_Graphics___1.jpg?p=facebook",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:55:00Z",
        content:
          "NEW YORK, Sept. 9, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, international youth organization UNITE 2030 announced the Youth SDG Summit, a 3-day virtual convening of young leaders and sustainability stakeholders a… [+3275 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "NDTV News",
        },
        author: null,
        title:
          "Not Fancy Car Number Plate: Businessman's Plea For New Aadhaar Opposed",
        description:
          "UIDAI has opposed the issuance of a new Aadhaar number to a businessman saying accepting such a demand could open the floodgates for more such requests. It, instead, asked the person to update his personal details to ensure exclusivity.",
        url: "https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/not-fancy-car-number-plate-businessmans-plea-for-new-aadhaar-opposed-2535788",
        urlToImage:
          "https://c.ndtvimg.com/2018-09/p43kukf8_aadhaar-reuters-650_625x300_26_September_18.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:54:19Z",
        content:
          "UIDAI had earlier said that a person's identity is fused with his Aadhaar number the moment it is issued. New Delhi: The Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) today opposed before the Del… [+2135 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Aajtak.in",
        },
        author: "aajtak.in",
        title:
          "सुप्र‍िया श्रीनेत बोलीं- अफगान‍ मुद्दे पर सरकार में नहीं स्पष्टता, सुधांशु त्रिवेदी ने द‍िया जवाब",
        description:
          "अफगानिस्तान में तालिबानराज का स्थापित हो गया है. भारत की आतंकवाद के खिलाफ नीति स्पष्ट है, लेकिन क्षेत्रीय संतुलन साधते हुए भारत का क्या रुख होगा, ये जानना अहम है. इसीलिए ये सवाल उठता है, तालिबान के प्रति भारत क्या रुख अपनाने वाला है? क्या प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र…",
        url: "https://www.aajtak.in/india/politics/video/india-s-stand-on-taliban-bjp-congress-spokesperson-debate-in-dangal-1324291-2021-09-09",
        urlToImage:
          "https://akm-img-a-in.tosshub.com/aajtak/images/video/202109/taliban1_1.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:54:11Z",
        content:
          ". , , . , ? ? . India, for now, has adopted a 'wait-and-watch' policy for Taliban. For India, it is the beginning of another phase in bilateral relations. There can be no isolation of the Taliban … [+96 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Aajtak.in",
        },
        author: "aajtak.in",
        title:
          "टीम इंडिया का एक और सदस्य कोरोना संक्रमित, मैनचेस्टर टेस्ट पर मंडराया संकट",
        description:
          "फिलहाल बीसीसीआई और इंग्लैंड एवं वेल्स क्रिकेट बोर्ड (ECB) आगे का रास्ता तलाशने के लिए संपर्क में हैं लेकिन सब कुछ आज खिलाड़ियों पर किए गए टेस्ट के नतीजों पर निर्भर करेगा.",
        url: "https://www.aajtak.in/sports/cricket/story/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-manchester-old-trafford-one-more-member-team-india-support-staff-tests-positive-for-covid-19-doubt-ntc-1324279-2021-09-09",
        urlToImage:
          "https://akm-img-a-in.tosshub.com/aajtak/images/story/202109/virat_kohli_pti_1rt-sixteen_nine.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:54:11Z",
        content:
          "Copyright © 2021 Living Media India Limited. For reprint rights: Syndications Today",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "SamMobile",
        },
        author: "Mihai M.",
        title: "Samsung India has some excellent Ganesh Chaturthi offers",
        description:
          "Samsung India has announced a new set of attractive offers on various consumer electronics to celebrate the Hindu festival Ganesh Chaturthi. The company offers cashback, easy EMIs, or at least some form of attractive deal on nearly everything needed to upgrad…",
        url: "https://www.sammobile.com/news/samsung-india-excellent-ganesh-chaturthi-offers/",
        urlToImage:
          "https://www.sammobile.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Samsung-Ganesh-Chaturthi-720x376.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:54:04Z",
        content:
          "Samsung India has announced a new set of attractive offers on various consumer electronics to celebrate the Hindu festival Ganesh Chaturthi. The company offers cashback, easy EMIs, or at least some f… [+1190 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Livemint",
        },
        author: "Himanshu",
        title:
          "The irrelevance of Indian GDP estimates to most of our citizens",
        description:
          "Official statistics may point to an economic recovery but people’s actual conditions have worsened.The fact that GDP data hardly captures the real extent of depressed economic activity in the informal sector makes it irrelevant to a large population dependent…",
        url: "https://www.livemint.com/opinion/columns/the-irrelevance-of-indian-gdp-estimates-to-most-of-our-citizens-11631206209056.html",
        urlToImage:
          "https://images.livemint.com/img/2021/09/09/600x338/483e0550-c2d3-11eb-a844-18a2b8c7293d_1629799954779_1631206324056.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:53:48Z",
        content:
          "Estimates of gross domestic product (GDP) for the first quarter of fiscal year 2021-22 were released on 31 August. These were much anticipated, given that the first quarter of last year had seen unpr… [+4699 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "The Indian Express",
        },
        author: "Express News Service",
        title:
          "Commemorating 125 years: Ex-servicemen body demands special coin, postage stamp for Saragarhi battle",
        description:
          "Brig. Kahlon said that even though the battle has been listed as one of the rare instances where a small body of men resisted the attack by vastly superior number of adversaries, the average youth was not aware of its importance.",
        url: "https://indianexpress.com/article/cities/chandigarh/ex-servicemen-body-special-coin-postage-stamp-saragarhi-battle-7499655/",
        urlToImage:
          "https://images.indianexpress.com/2021/09/Indian-Express-logo-13-6-3.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:52:27Z",
        content:
          "The All India Defence Brotherhood Association has demanded that the 125th year of the Battle of Saragarhi fought in 1897 should be celebrated in a fitting manner with the release of a special postage… [+1389 chars]",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Aajtak.in",
        },
        author: "अरविंद ओझा, हिमांशु मिश्रा",
        title:
          "दिल्लीः त्रिलोचन सिंह वजीर मर्डर केस की जांच करेगी क्राइम ब्रांच और स्पेशल सेल",
        description:
          "पुलिस हरप्रीत सिंह खालसा के जानकारों से भी पूछताछ कर रही है. दरअसल, पुलिस ने मौका-ए-वारदात यानी मोती नगर इलाके के बसई दारापुर से करीब 10 से ज्यादा सीसीटीवी कैमरों की फुटेज बरामद की है. जिसमे दो संदिग्ध जाते हुए नजर आ रहे हैं.",
        url: "https://www.aajtak.in/crime/news/story/delhi-motinagar-national-conference-trilochan-singh-wazir-murder-case-investigation-crime-branch-special-cell-police-crime-ntc-1324275-2021-09-09",
        urlToImage:
          "https://akm-img-a-in.tosshub.com/aajtak/images/story/202109/tmc-sixteen_nine.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:51:57Z",
        content:
          "Copyright © 2021 Living Media India Limited. For reprint rights: Syndications Today",
      },
      {
        source: {
          id: null,
          name: "Business Standard",
        },
        author: "Press Trust of India",
        title:
          "At BRICS summit, Putin slams US for creating 'new crisis' in Afghanistan",
        description:
          "Russian President Vladimir Putin slammed the US and its allies for creating a new crisis in Afghanistan and told the BRICS leaders that they have to pay special attention to situation",
        url: "https://www.business-standard.com/article/international/at-brics-summit-putin-slams-us-for-creating-new-crisis-in-afghanistan-121090901401_1.html",
        urlToImage:
          "https://bsmedia.business-standard.com/_media/bs/img/article/2020-10/23/full/1603425002-2161.jpg",
        publishedAt: "2021-09-09T16:50:00Z",
        content:
          "Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday slammed the US and its allies for creating a new crisis in Afghanistan and told the BRICS leaders that they have to pay special attention to the situa… [+4996 chars]",
      },
    ],
  };
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);

    this.state = {
      news: this.news,
      loading: false,
    };
  }

  async componentDidMount() {
    let url =
      "https://newsapi.org/v2/everything?q=health&from=2021-08-09&sortBy=publishedAt&apiKey=f9aa6d33d92045f7b656982d9957fe8b";
    let data = await fetch(url);
    let parsedData = await data.json()

  }

  render() {
    return (
      <div>
        <div className="container my-3">
          <h1>
            <strong style={{ color: "green" }}>DiemFlash </strong>
            <u>Top-Headlines</u>
          </h1>
          <div className="row">
            {this.state.news.articles.map((element) => {
              return (
                <div className="col-md-3">
                  <Newitem
                    title={element.title.slice(0, 45)}
                    description={element.description.slice(0, 90)}
                    url={element.url}
                    urlImage={element.urlToImage}
                    idName={element.source.name}
                  />
                </div>
              );
            })}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default news;
